literature-notes

Introducing Game Theory

Metadata

  • Author: Ivan Pastine, Tuvana Pastine
  • Full Title: Introducing Game Theory
  • Category:

Highlights

  • Game theory is a set of tools used to help analyze situations where an individual’s best course of action depends on what others do or are expected to do. Game theory allows us to understand how people act in situations where they are interconnected. (Location 42)
    • Tags:
    • Note: Game theory definition
  • Game theory is useful whenever there is strategic interaction, whenever how well you do depends on the actions of others as well as your own choices. (Location 57)
    • Tags: #math
